Website for 2017-Fall-UVA-CS 6501-002 Advanced Deep Learning


This website includes a (growing) list of papers and lectures we read about deep learning and related. Feel free to submit pull requests when you find my typos or have comments. The covered materials are by no means an exhaustive list, but are papers that we have read or plan to learn in our reading group.

No. Date Title and Information
1 2017, Aug, 22 Foundations I -Andrew Ng - Nuts and Bolts of Applying Deep Learning
2 2017, Aug, 24 Foundations II - Ganguli - Theoretical Neuroscience and Deep Learning DLSS16
3 2017, Aug, 29 Reinforcement I - Pineau - RL Basic Concepts
4 2017, Aug, 31 Generative I - GAN tutorial by Ian Goodfellow
5 2017, Sep, 5 Foundations III - Investigating Behaviors of DNN
6 2017, Sep, 7 Foundations IV - Investigating Behaviors of DNN
7 2017, Sep, 12 Foundations V - More about Behaviors of DNN
8 2017, Sep, 14 Foundations VI - More about Behaviors of DNN
9 2017, Sep, 19 Structure I - Varying DNN structures for an application
10 2017, Sep, 21 Structure II - DNN with Varying Structures
11 2017, Sep, 26 Structure III - DNN with Attention
12 2017, Sep, 28 Structure IV - DNN with Attention 2
13 2017, Oct, 3 Structure V - DNN with Memory
14 2017, Oct, 5 Structure VI - DNN with Adaptive Structures
15 2017, Oct, 10 Reliable Applications I - Applications
16 2017, Oct, 12 Reliable Applications II - Data
17 2017, Oct, 17 Reliable Applications III - Applications 2
18 2017, Oct, 19 Reliable Applications IV - Robustness to Data
19 2017, Oct, 24 Reliable Applications V - Understanding and Composing DNNs
20 2017, Oct, 26 Reliable Applications VI - Robustness
21 2017, Oct, 31 Optimization I - Understanding DNN Optimization
22 2017, Nov, 2 Optimization II - DNN for Optimization
23 2017, Nov, 7 Optimization III - Optimization for DNN
24 2017, Nov, 9 Optimization IV - DNN for Optimization
25 2017, Nov, 14 Generative II - Deep Generative Models
26 2017, Nov, 16 Generative III - GAN and More
27 2017, Nov, 21 RL II - Basic tutorial RLSS17
28 2017, Nov, 28 RL III - Basic tutorial RLSS17 (2)
29 2017, Nov, 30 RL IV - RL with varying structures
30 2017, Dec, 5 RL V - RL with varying Applications
